mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (phone, id_number,name,gender,age,password, is_deleted) VALUES (#{phone}, #{idNumber},#{name},#{gender},#{age},#{password},#{isDeleted})
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET phone = #{phone}, id_number = #{idNumber}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age}, password = #{password}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select * from User where name like CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
